mapper.insert: insert into documentaryDetail (login, varietyCode, cmd, counts, openPrice, openTime, closePrice, closeTime, poundage, status, leftoverCounts, alreadyProfit) values (#{login}, #{varietyCode}, #{cmd}, #{counts}, #{openPrice}, #{openTime}, #{closePrice}, #{closeTime}, #{poundage}, #{status}, #{leftoverCounts}, #{alreadyProfit})
mapper.update: update documentaryDetail set login = #{login}, varietyCode = #{varietyCode}, cmd = #{cmd}, counts = #{counts}, openPrice = #{openPrice}, openTime = #{openTime}, closePrice = #{closePrice}, closeTime = #{closeTime}, poundage = #{poundage}, status = #{status}, leftoverCounts = #{leftoverCounts}, alreadyProfit = #{alreadyProfit} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, login, varietyCode, cmd, counts, openPrice, openTime, closePrice, closeTime, poundage, status, leftoverCounts, alreadyProfit FROM documentaryDetail

select id, login, varietyCode, cmd, counts, openPrice, openTime, closePrice, closeTime, poundage, status, leftoverCounts, alreadyProfit,newOpenOrderNum from DocumentaryDetail where closeTime is null order by openTime asc
